about_the_game:
Vacuum Pilot 2 is a thrilling 2D speedrunning game that’s entirely mouse-controlled. Challenge players worldwide for the fastest times, compare your records with friends, and study replays of the best runs to discover new strategies and perfect your skills.

Intuitive Gameplay

Take control with just your mouse! Simply hold the left mouse button to accelerate toward your cursor. Master smooth drifting around corners to charge your boost, then unleash it for a burst of speed and gain the competitive edge.

Play Your Way

  • Relax and tackle levels at your own pace in Solo Mode.

  • Create custom rooms to play with friends.

  • Feeling competitive? Join the Ranked Queue, climb the leaderboard, and prove you belong in the Master League!

Motivating Progression

Earn in-game currency and experience points as you complete levels. Unlock new vehicles and customize them to create your own unique style!

Level Editor

Unleash your creativity with the same tools we use to craft official levels. Design, upload, and share your creations, then watch players from around the globe compete for the best times on your custom levels!

Fair Free-to-Play Model

Vacuum Pilot 2 is designed to be fair and accessible to everyone. There are no pay-to-win mechanics—only optional cosmetic purchases to personalize your experience. Enjoy the game without ever feeling pressured to spend money.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10 / 64-bit Windows 11
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.20 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p 60FPS; Lowest Settings
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10 / 64-bit Windows 11
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.00 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 | AMD Radeon RX 5600 XT
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p 90 FPS; Max Settings
